description:
When a lantern isn’t bright enough and a headlamp isn’t right, that’s when this area light shines. Whether you’re hanging it above your camp kitchen, or lighting some after dark close-up shots, the 3 Face Mini Area Light lets you tap into up to 800 lumens. There are 3 different light temperatures to choose from and infinite dimming, so you can customize the lighting to your environment. And the large onboard battery doubles as a power bank.

  • 3 different white light temperatures: cool (6500K), natural (4200K), or warm (3000K)
  • 5000mAh battery can also be used to charge other USB powered devices, via the type-A USB port
  • Smooth dimming, just press and hold the button to dial in your perfect brightness; range: 40-800 lumens
  • 2 different modes, use just the center light panel or use all 3 sides
  • SOS mode is there if things take a turn for the worse
  • LED battery indicator lets you know how your battery is doing in use and while charging
  • IP65 waterproofing isn’t bothered by heavy rain
  • Easy USB-C charging, 0-100% in 2.6h
  • ¼” thread tripod mounts let you mount your light on tripods or other camera mounts
  • Velcro strap for attaching to straps, poles, etc
  • Dimensions: 7.8 x 10.3 x 2cm
  • In the box: 3 Face Area Light, carabiner, storage pouch, USB-C charging cable, and manual
name: Claymore 3 Face Mini Area Light
